alert.note: Alert for Santa Cruz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:27PM MST until July 21 at 7:15PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MST FOR SOUTHWESTERN COCHISE AND SOUTHEASTERN SANTA CRUZ COUNTIES... At 527 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Parker Canyon Lake, or 15 miles west of Sierra Vista, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Parker Canyon Lake, Fort Huachuca, Ramsey Canyon Preserve and Canelo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
